definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: Uses small-diameter wheels, a short wheelbase, and steering mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 使用小直徑輪，短軸距，與導向機構。

sentences.english: The chassis beneath the car comes from an Audi RS 5, with its wheelbase shortened and roof lowered.
sentences.chinese: 底盤沿用奧迪RS5，縮短了軸距，削低了車高。

sentences.english: They also correct the wheel base length back to standard by moving the diff forward.
sentences.chinese: 它們還通過差速器前移將軸距向前修正到標準位置。

sentences.english: Its mystery lies in the ingenious center of gravity distributed and the suitable spread of axis and the gauge .
sentences.chinese: 它的奧妙在於巧妙的重心分佈及適當的軸距和輪距。

sentences.english: Sport-Luxury Catrike with a wide track and long wheel base.
sentences.chinese: 運動奢華的大貓，具有寬輪距和長軸距。

definition: range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)
dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
